attributes.action: Stop the extradition of alleged hacker Gary McKinnon to the U.S.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the obvious mental condition of Mr McKinnon and the fact that he is alleged to have committed the crime in this country we the undersigned considered he should face justice in the U.K.

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual legal cases. The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
